Detailed Description

Enhanced watershed segmentation following Lakshmanan, Hondl and Rabin.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.EnhancedWatershedSegmenter.EnhancedWatershedSegmenter ( int  minThresh,
int  dataIncr,
int  maxThresh,
int  sizeThresholdInPixels,
int  deltaForCluster 
)

Parameters:
minThresh,: minimum pixel value for a pixel to be part of a region
dataIncr,: quantization interval. Use 1 if you don't want to quantize
maxThresh,: values > maxThresh are treated as maxThresh
sizeThresholdInPixels,: Blobs smaller than the specified size will get ignored.
deltaForCluster,: Specify how many data-increments a cluster is allowed to range over. For example, if you specify 0, then a cluster will contain only values that fall in the same interval as the maximum. Larger values of D also yield clusters at larger scales. 
00043                                                                                                                                   {
00044         this.myDelta = deltaForCluster;
00045         this.myMinSize = sizeThresholdInPixels;
00046         this.minThresh = minThresh;
00047         this.maxThresh = maxThresh;
00048         this.dataIncr = dataIncr;

Member Function Documentation

LabelResult edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.EnhancedWatershedSegmenter.label ( LatLonGrid  dataval  )  [virtual]

Creates a labeled grid where background pixels are set to 0 and labels for objects go 1,2,3.

.. All pixels > thresh are part of an object.

Implements edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.Segmenter.

00267                                                 {
00268        LatLonGrid marked = findLocalMaxima(dataval);
00269        LabelResult initial = new ThresholdSegmenter(0).label(marked);
00270        LabelResult pruned = RegionProperty.pruneBySize(initial, dataval, myMinSize);
00271        return pruned;

00274                                                             {
00275         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("ewshed");
00276         
00277         // data
00278         LatLonGrid grid = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling()).crop(1000, 2100, 100, 200);
00279         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00280         
00281         // int MIN = 200; int MAX = 500; int INCR = 10;// log scaling
00282         int MIN = 1; int MAX = 100; int INCR = 1;// linear scaling
00283         
00284         for (int sizethresh=5; sizethresh <= 20; sizethresh += 5){
00285             EnhancedWatershedSegmenter seg = new EnhancedWatershedSegmenter(MIN, INCR, MAX, sizethresh, 5);
00286             LatLonGrid label = seg.label(grid).label;
00287             KmlWriter.write(label, out, "ewsheds_"+sizethresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00288         }
00289         
00290         grid = new ConvolutionFilter(ConvolutionFilter.gauss(9, 9)).smooth(grid);
00291         for (int sizethresh=5; sizethresh <= 20; sizethresh += 5){
00292             EnhancedWatershedSegmenter seg = new EnhancedWatershedSegmenter(MIN, INCR, MAX, sizethresh, 5);
00293             LatLonGrid label = seg.label(grid).label;
00294             KmlWriter.write(label, out, "smewsheds_"+sizethresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00295         }
